    AGTheme Class

    AGTheme.Rd

    R6 Class for controlling the visual appearance of plot elements.

    Format

    R6Class object.

    Details

    AGTheme Class

    Fields

    plot.background

    Controls the plot background appearance

    plot.margin

    Controls plot margins

    panel.background

    Controls panel background appearance

    panel.grid.major

    Controls major grid lines

    panel.grid.minor

    Controls minor grid lines

    panel.border

    Controls panel border

    axis.line

    Controls axis line appearance

    axis.text

    Controls axis text appearance

    axis.title

    Controls axis title appearance

    axis.ticks

    Controls axis ticks appearance

    Methods

    initialize(...)

    Create a new AGTheme with the specified elements

    apply()

    Apply theme elements to the current viewport

    Methods

    Public methods

    • AGTheme$new()

    • AGTheme$apply()

    • AGTheme$clone()

    Method new()

    Initialize a new theme

    Usage

    AGTheme$new(...)

    Arguments

    ...

    Named list of theme elements

    Method apply()

    Apply theme elements to the current viewport

    Usage

    AGTheme$apply()

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    AGTheme$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.

    Examples

    if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Create a custom theme
custom_theme <- AGTheme$new(
  plot.background = list(fill = "white"),
  panel.grid.major = list(color = "grey80")
)

# Apply theme to a plot
plot <- AGPlot$new(data)
plot$set_theme(custom_theme)
} # }
